title: Very good coffee
body:
Very satisfied with this machine, the coffee is strong (bought this Jacobs Ristretto Capsule -am in Germany and I think it is tge equivalent of L'Or) and with a nice crema on the top. Am a coffee lover and definitely like strong coffee. And this is good! I use boiling water at home (no waiting time) and bring hot water in a thermos when I am on the road (waiting time 2-3 minutes) and that is very reasonable. So handy. Anywhere, want a coffee hop hop there it is. The machine is quite heavy and seems strong and sturdy..would not take it on a hike I guess but for the car it's perfect.
Happy me.. 5 stars
